snippet.title: Undertale Yellow (Official Reveal Trailer)
snippet.description:
**This trailer does NOT represent the final product or the demo. The footage you see is from early alpha**

THE DEMO IN NOW OUT! Download it here :D
http://gamejolt.com/games/undertale-yellow/136925

Our Twitter!
https://twitter.com/UndertaleYellow

Undertale Yellow is a new fan game based on the yellow souls life from Toby Fox's: Undertale. It will have a mostly original soundtrack with a couple remixes thrown in, new and old characters, and never before explored areas.
We've been working hard the past few months and are preparing a demo now.

Credits (April 2016):   
Music
MasterSwordRemix (Director of the game)
MyNewSoundtrack
NoteBlock

Story
Pippy V. (Lead writer)
MasterSwordRemix
AWildDaydreamer

Concept Art
Gaziter
ThisIsn'tEli
Litvac
Grey Duovis
Still Liam
Fireburn02
TheAllKnowingNoodle

Sprites
AWildDaydreamer
Fireburn02
Gaziter
Emmalume
Kinda MasterSwordRemix

Unspecified
Orane

Programmer
SpartanScooter
MysteryRacer
